LVO: Number of LVOs eligible for thromboylsis
nonLVO: Number of nonLVOs eligible for thromboylsis
All thrombolysis patients: Number of patients eligible for thromboylsis
LVO thrombectomy: Number of patients eligible for thrombectomy
CORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of LVO admissions going to HASU first and it's correct
INCORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of LVO admissions going to HASU first and it's incorrect
column7: Admissions going to HASU first that's correct
LVO_as_proportion_of_ischaemic_stroke: rate of mimics as a % of strokes

CORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of LVO admissions going to CSC first and it's correct
INCORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of LVO admissions going to CSC first and it's incorrect
column7: Admissions going to HASU first that's incorrect
LVO_as_proportion_of_ischaemic_stroke: Rate of haemorragics as % of ischaemic strokes

CORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of LVO admissions going to right location first
INCORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of LVO admissions going to wrong location first
column7: Admissions going to CSC first that's correct
LVO_as_proportion_of_ischaemic_stroke: Stroke symptom onset time known (used to select the patients to do the LVO diagnostic test on, else to HASU as will not be eligible for any treatment)

CORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of nonLVO admissions going to HASU first and it's correct
INCORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of nonLVO admissions going to HASU first and it's incorrect
column7: Admissions going to CSC first that's incorrect
LVO_as_proportion_of_ischaemic_stroke: Decision bias: Any patient with a CSC less than this many minutes more (over a nearer HASU) will have their location determined by the diagnostic test.

CORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of nonLVO admissions going to CSC first and it's correct
INCORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of nonLVO admissions going to CSC first and it's incorrect
column7: admissions_go_to_HASU first
LVO_as_proportion_of_ischaemic_stroke: Specificity for stroke patients (used on the nonLVO stroke patients and haemorrage patients, ie. stroke patients but not LVOs)

CORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of nonLVO admissions going to right location first
INCORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of nonLVO admissions going to wrong location first
column7: admissions_go_to_CSC_first
LVO_as_proportion_of_ischaemic_stroke: Sensitivity for stroke patients (used on the LVO stroke patients)

CORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of mimic admissions going to HASU first and it's correct
INCORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of mimic admissions going to HASU first and it's incorrect
column7: admissions_go_to_right_first
LVO_as_proportion_of_ischaemic_stroke: Specificity for mimics (used on the mimics, assume less are likely to be misclassified as a LVO)

CORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of mimic admissions going to CSC first and it's correct
INCORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of mimic admissions going to CSC first and it's incorrect
column7: admissions_go_to_wrong_first
LVO_as_proportion_of_ischaemic_stroke: nonLVO patients that are suitable for thrombolysis

CORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of mimic admissions going to right location first
INCORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of mimic admissions going to wrong location first
column7: admissions_go_to_HASU_final
LVO_as_proportion_of_ischaemic_stroke: LVO patients that are suitable for thrombolysis

CORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of haemorrage admissions going to HASU first and it's correct
INCORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of haemorrage admissions going to HASU first and it's incorrect
column7: admissions_go_to_CSC_final
LVO_as_proportion_of_ischaemic_stroke: LVO patients that are suitable for thrombolysis

CORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of haemorrage admissions going to CSC first and it's correct
INCORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of haemorrage admissions going to CSC first and it's incorrect
column7: admissions_moving_to_HASU
LVO_as_proportion_of_ischaemic_stroke: LVO patients that are suitable for thrombolysis

CORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of haemorrage admissions going to right location first
INCORRECT ALLOCATION: Number of haemorrage admissions going to wrong location first
column7: admissions_transferred_HASU_to_CSC
LVO_as_proportion_of_ischaemic_stroke: Of those LVO patients suitable for thrombolysis, proportion suitable for thrombectomy

column7: admissions_transferred_CSC_to_HASU
LVO_as_proportion_of_ischaemic_stroke: Proportion patients had thrombolysis that are repatriated (from CSC to a nearer HASU)

column7: minutes_travelling_to_right_first (useful?)
LVO_as_proportion_of_ischaemic_stroke: Proportion patients not had thrombolysis that are repatriated (from CSC to a nearer HASU)

column7: Number of admissions with an_unnecessary_delay for their_thrombolysis (only 2 patient groups 1. LVO elig for tlysis & not Ttomy 2. nonLVO elig Ttomy – these values are below)
LVO_as_proportion_of_ischaemic_stroke: Proportion of all admissions that are mimics

column7: Unneccesary extra travelling (includes 60 mins for each stay in wrong place)
LVO_as_proportion_of_ischaemic_stroke: Proportion of all admissions that are strokes

column7: Mimic admissions going further to a CSC (these have no treatment in model, so no treatment delay, just extra travelling and now at a location further from home)
LVO_as_proportion_of_ischaemic_stroke: Proportion of all admissions that are ischaemic

column7: haemorrage admissions going further to a CSC (these have no treatment in model,  so no treatment delay, just extra travelling and now at a location further from home)
LVO_as_proportion_of_ischaemic_stroke: Proportion of all admissions that are haemorragics

column7: nonLVO admissions going further to a CSC (a proportion of these have treatment, so for some there’s a treatment delay for others no treatment delay, just extra travelling and now at a location further from home)
LVO_as_proportion_of_ischaemic_stroke: Proportion of all admissions that are LVO

column7: nonLVO admissions elig for thrombolysis so delay in treatment
LVO_as_proportion_of_ischaemic_stroke: Proportion of all admissions that are nonLVO

column7: nonLVO admissions not elig for thrombolysis, no delay in treatment but travel further
LVO_as_proportion_of_ischaemic_stroke: Proportion of all admissions that are eligible for thrombolysis

column7: LVO admissions going unecessarily further to a CSC (these are 2 patietn groups, those that need thrombolysis, and those that don’t)
LVO_as_proportion_of_ischaemic_stroke: Proportion of all admissions that are eligible for thrombectomy

column7: LVO admisisons elig for thrombolysis but not thrombectomy going unnecessarily further to CSC
LVO not elig for any treatment going furhter to a CSC
